Land Mine thought about why she was healed so fast. It must have been becau=
se of the abuse she took over the years, now she was more resilient. She de=
cided to come out of the CR Tank. She shook Time Bomb some.

"Time Bomb? We=
ren't you repaired?" She asked. She seen how diced up he was, it looked lik=
e someone gutted him out.

"Nobody helped you?" Land Mine said. She grabbed=
 Time Bomb. He wouldn't come off of the floor. She pried him off, but he le=
ft a sticky smear of organs and mech fluid all over the floor. She put him =
in a CR Tank and walked around the base.

"DrillBit? I'm back! But Time Bom=
b is hurt, I put him in a CR Chamber, I dreamed he was dead, I was scared t=
hat he might be. But he seems alright, except that somebody forgot him over=
 by the Cr Tank." Land Mine called out...
